price: Na Ibrahim alipo sema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Ujaalie mji huu uwe wa amani, na uniepushe mimi na wanangu na kuabudu masanamu.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدَ ءَامِنٗا وَٱجۡنُبۡنِي وَبَنِيَّ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ ٱلۡأَصۡنَامَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Ili watu wako wapate kuzingatia na waache ushirikina wao, wakumbushe kauli ya baba yao Ibrahim baada ya kuijenga Alkaaba. Alisema: Ewe Mola Mlezi! Ujaalie mji huu wenye Alkaaba uwe wa amani, ulindwe na wenye kudhulumu. Na unibaidishe, niwe mbali, mimi na wanangu na ibada ya masanamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla ib'rāhīmu rabbi ij'ʿal hādhā al-balada āminan wa-uj'nub'nī wabaniyya an naʿbuda al-aṣnāma
